project_info.title: Sakshi: India's First Conscious Living Ecosystem

outline.title: Sakshi: India's First Conscious Living Ecosystem
outline.summary: Title slide introducing Sakshi as India's first conscious living ecosystem platform, making sustainable living accessible, affordable, and aspirational for 1.4 billion Indians.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: India's Triple Crisis
outline.summary: India faces interconnected crises in health (135M diabetes), food waste (68M tonnes), farmer poverty (86% earn <₹10K/month), and environmental degradation, with healthy food remaining unaffordable for 95% of the population.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: The Sakshi Solution
outline.summary: Integrated ecosystem combining Sakshi Cafe (triple pricing), Repair Cafe, Swap Events, Upcycle Studio, and Digital Marketplace, all powered by Seva token economy rewarding sustainable behaviors.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Profitable Impact Model
outline.summary: Six revenue streams generating ₹24 crores by Year 3 with 15% EBITDA margin, while serving all income levels through innovative triple pricing (Community/Fair/Supporter) ensuring universal access.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: ₹50,000 Crore Market Opportunity
outline.summary: Massive and rapidly growing market across health food (₹30K cr), organic food (₹22K cr), restaurant tech (₹26K cr), targeting 60 million health-conscious urban Indians with 20%+ annual growth.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: 8 Core Proprietary Innovations
outline.summary: First part showcasing 8 primary innovations that create competitive moat: Community Meal Sponsorship, Farm-to-Table Transparency, Zero-Waste Dashboard, Ayurvedic Customization, Mindful Dining Tracker, Regenerative Actions, Nutrition Passport, and AI Meditation Technology with detailed descriptions of each.
outline.image_plan: No images needed, using icons for visual interest

outline.title: 7 Additional Innovations + Competitive Moat
outline.summary: Continuation showing 7 additional proprietary features (Seva Token Economy, Triple Pricing, Gratitude Wall, Impact Dashboard, Farmer Profit Sharing, Circular Economy, Wellness Sanctuary) and explaining the defensibility through network effects, data moats, and technology barriers that would take competitors 2-3 years and ₹5+ crores to replicate.

outline.title: Production-Ready Technology Platform
outline.summary: Complete scalable platform with 97 database tables, 100+ APIs, 12 frontend components, AI integration, PWA support - 90,000+ lines of code ready for immediate deployment.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Strong Validation & Product-Market Fit
outline.summary: 10M+ Satvic Movement community, 50,000+ cafe requests, 87% survey willingness to visit weekly, 12 franchise partners identified - proven demand before launch with no direct competitors.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Phased Expansion Strategy
outline.summary: Three-phase rollout from Bangalore pilot (6 months) to 5 cities (18 months) to 25 locations nationwide (36 months) using community-owned franchise model with 60x LTV/CAC ratio.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Path to ₹24 Crore Revenue
outline.summary: Year 1: ₹4.8cr revenue (5 locations), Year 2: ₹14.4cr (breakeven), Year 3: ₹24cr revenue with ₹3.6cr profit (15% margin) - strong unit economics with 65% gross margin.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Triple Bottom Line Impact
outline.summary: By Year 3: 9M meals served, 500 farmers supported, 10K items repaired, 15K tonnes CO₂ reduced, 450M liters water saved - measurable social, environmental, and health outcomes.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Mission-Driven Expert Team
outline.summary: Experienced founders combining technology, food, and sustainability expertise, partnered with Subah Saraf (10M+ Satvic Movement followers), supported by strong advisory board.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: The Ask: ₹10 Crores Series A
outline.summary: Raising ₹10 crores for 20% equity to scale from 1 to 25 locations - 60% expansion, 20% technology, 15% marketing, 5% team - with clear milestones and 3.5x return in 5 years.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Vision: Transforming India by 2030
outline.summary: 1,000 locations serving 100M people, ₹1,000cr revenue, 1B meals served, 100K farmers supported - making Sakshi synonymous with conscious living and proving sustainable living can be mainstream.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Invest in Sakshi
outline.summary: Massive market, proven demand, unique moat, strong economics, scalable model, triple bottom line returns - join us in building India's first conscious living ecosystem.
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed
